effects: Expire Max Health Restored per Second: 20%
Expire Max Mana Restored per Second: 20%
abilities.description: Brings you to life with full health and mana 5 seconds after you die, at the location where you died. Reincarnation must be used within 5 minutes or Aegis of the Immortal disappears. If it expires, it will heal you over 5 seconds (dispels on damage).

name: Aegis of the Immortal
description: The Immortal was said to own a shield that protected him from death itself.
trivia: Aegis was previously an ordinary recipe item that contained three charges. After it was removed, it was then obtainable as a droppable item from Roshan.
In Greek mythology, an aegis that was described as "ageless and immortal" was presented to Zeus.
When selecting Roshan, this item can be seen in his inventory.
